unnormalised: Is sparks flying between Ranbir Kapoor and…wait for it…Shanaya Kapoor?! Sources close to the Dharma Productions camp are whispering about late-night script readings turning into something *more*. We’re talking beyond just collaborating for "Brahmastra 2"!
normalised: Is sparks flying between Ranbir Kapoor and…wait for it…Shanaya Kapoor?! Sources close to the Dharma Productions camp are whispering about late-night script readings turning into something more. We’re talking beyond just collaborating for "Brahmastra two"!

unnormalised: Our insider, who we’re calling “Chaiwala Chintu” for now, claims he saw them leaving Karan Johar's place at 3 AM last Tuesday. Separate cars, of course. But still! Suspicious, no?
normalised: Our insider, who we’re calling “Chaiwala Chintu” for now, claims he saw them leaving Karan Johar's place at three A M last Tuesday. Separate cars, of course. But still! Suspicious, no?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Ananya Pandey was spotted having lunch with Aditya Roy Kapur at Bastian. They looked pretty cozy, fueling rumors that things are still very much ON. Forget what Filmfare said last month!
normalised: Meanwhile, Ananya Pandey was spotted having lunch with Aditya Roy Kapur at Bastian. They looked pretty cozy, fueling rumors that things are still very much ON. Forget what Filmfare said last month!

unnormalised: And hold your samosas, folks! Apparently, Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma are planning a HUGE bash for their daughter Vamika's upcoming 3rd birthday. Think Bollywood’s A-listers, a kids’ zone bigger than Marine Drive, and enough gulab jamun to feed the entire nation! Stay tuned for more masala! This is your daily dose of Bollywood buzz!
